meanings.definition: Gharials: a type of large, long-snouted crocodile native to South Asia.
meanings.sent1: The gharials basked in the sun along the riverbank.
meanings.sent2: We saw a group of gharials swimming gracefully in the water.
meanings.sent3: The gharials decided to have a race to see who could swim the fastest.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as rare and beautiful as spotting a gharial in the wild.
meanings.sent5: The gharials' distinctive snouts make them easy to identify.

meanings.definition: Gharials: the plural form of the word 'gharial', referring to more than one of these crocodiles.
meanings.sent1: Look at all the gharials sunning themselves on the rocks.
meanings.sent2: The zoo has a new exhibit featuring gharials from different regions.
meanings.sent3: The gharials threw a party to celebrate their successful fishing trip.
meanings.sent4: The river was teeming with gharials, a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The gharials' population has been steadily increasing due to conservation efforts.
